abstract: West Virginia's State Division of Homeland Security and Emergency Management announces 23 people have been killed by record flooding; thousands have been stranded and equal number without utilities, and 100 homes are known to have sustained heavy damage or been destroyed.

headline.print_headline: 23 Deaths and Vast Wreckage in West Virginia Floods
headline.main: West Virginia Floods Cause 23 Deaths and Vast Wreckage

snippet: Firefighters rescued people from rooftops after the record-setting deluge, which left thousands stranded, cut power to many others and destroyed homes.
lead_paragraph: Firefighters rescued people from rooftops after the record-setting deluge, which left thousands stranded, cut power to many others and destroyed homes.
